title.rendered: How to claim a free Unstoppable Domain?

content.rendered:
[coin-section ticker=”bitcoin” color-mode=”light”]

To Claim a free Unstoppable Domain via the Unstoppable Domains website, you need to attach your ETH-wallet with the web3 support (MetaMask – instructions). Then, you should claim the domain from the UD website. The link to the free domains page will be shared with you once we start the AMA and will be available for the next 24h. 

To claim the domain you need to follow these steps:

Step 1: Message at @UnstoppableDomainsBot to receive a free domain. You’ll receive the link to open a giveaway page at the Unstoppable Domains website.

Step 2: Choose any name you like from the list and click on Continue.

Step 3: Connect your ETH-wallet via MetaMask, so you’ll be able to manage domains online at the Unstoppable Domains website.

Step 4: You have an opportunity to attach your addresses from Atomic Wallet to any applicable asset that you want to see with a human-readable name.

Step 5: Claim your Domain! Once the domain is confirmed on the blockchain, the @UnstoppableDomainsBot will send you the message with instructions and tutorials on how to use the domains inside Atomic wallet.

excerpt.rendered: To claim and manage your .crypto domain via the Unstoppable Domains website, you need to attach your ETH-wallet with the web3 support. Then, you should claim the domain from the UD website. The link to the free domains page will be shared with you once we start the AMA and will be available for the next 24h.
